languages.text: "Я предлагаю координаты места, где находится ваш будущий трофей и отряд арбитров, который значительно увеличит шансы на захват судна. Мы помогаем вам добыть корабль, вы — становитесь богаче и наследуете союз с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Арбитес{/g}, заключенный Леди Теодорой. Вам судить, насколько это в ваших интересах".

"What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Я предлагаю координаты места, где находится ваш будущий трофей и отряд арбитров, который значительно увеличит шансы на захват судна. Мы помогаем вам добыть корабль, вы — становитесь богаче и наследуете союз с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Арбитес{/g}, заключенный Леди Теодорой. Вам судить, насколько это в ваших интересах".

traits.locale_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the Adeptus Arbites. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

"What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

languages.text: «Lo que le ofrezco son las coordenadas de su futuro trofeo y un equipo de Arbitrator para ayudar en la captura de la nave. Aumentará su fortuna y continuará la alianza entre lady Theodora y el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Es usted quien debe juzgar los beneficios de esta oportunidad».
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que le ofrezco son las coordenadas de su futuro trofeo y un equipo de Arbitrator para ayudar en la captura de la nave. Aumentará su fortuna y continuará la alianza entre lady Theodora y el Adeptus Arbites. Es usted quien debe juzgar los beneficios de esta oportunidad».

languages.text: “我会为你提供战利品的坐标，还会提供一队法务官，协助你夺得舰船。这会让你的王朝更加富庶，也会让西奥多拉夫人与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}法务部{/g}之间的联盟继续发展壮大。这个机会的价值，需要你来亲自判断。”
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “我会为你提供战利品的坐标，还会提供一队法务官，协助你夺得舰船。这会让你的王朝更加富庶，也会让西奥多拉夫人与法务部之间的联盟继续发展壮大。这个机会的价值，需要你来亲自判断。”

languages.text: « Ce que je vous offre, ce sont les coordonnées de votre futur trophée et une équipe d'arbitrators pour vous aider à prendre le contrôle du vaisseau. Une occasion unique de vous enrichir tout en consolidant l'alliance forgée par dame Théodora avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. À vous de juger de la valeur des bénéfices à la clé. »
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je vous offre, ce sont les coordonnées de votre futur trophée et une équipe d'arbitrators pour vous aider à prendre le contrôle du vaisseau. Une occasion unique de vous enrichir tout en consolidant l'alliance forgée par dame Théodora avec l'Adeptus Arbites. À vous de juger de la valeur des bénéfices à la clé. »

languages.text: 「私が提供しているのは、あなたの未来の戦利品の座標と、その船を奪うために手伝ってくれるアービトレイターのチームです。あなたは富を得ることができ、レディ・シオドーラが{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}アデプトゥス・アルビテス{/g}と結んだ同盟を継続することになります。この機会の価値を判断するのはあなた次第です」
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「私が提供しているのは、あなたの未来の戦利品の座標と、その船を奪うために手伝ってくれるアービトレイターのチームです。あなたは富を得ることができ、レディ・シオドーラがアデプトゥス・アルビテスと結んだ同盟を継続することになります。この機会の価値を判断するのはあなた次第です」

languages.text: "Size teklif ettiğim şey, alacağınız ödülün koordinatları ile gemiyi ele geçirmenize yardım edecek bir Yargıcı ekibidir. Zenginleşecek ve Leydi Theodora'nın {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} ile yaptığı ittifakı sürdüreceksiniz. Bu fırsatın değerini belirlemek ise size kalmış."
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Size teklif ettiğim şey, alacağınız ödülün koordinatları ile gemiyi ele geçirmenize yardım edecek bir Yargıcı ekibidir. Zenginleşecek ve Leydi Theodora'nın Adeptus Arbites ile yaptığı ittifakı sürdüreceksiniz. Bu fırsatın değerini belirlemek ise size kalmış."

languages.text: "Was ich Euch anbiete, sind die Koordinaten Eurer zukünftigen Trophäe und ein Team von Arbitratoren, die Euch helfen, das Schiff zu übernehmen. Ihr würdet dadurch reich und setzt außerdem die zwischen Lady Theodora und dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} geschlossene Allianz fort. Über den Wert dieser Gelegenheit müsst Ihr selbst entscheiden."
languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel. You will be enriched and you will be continuing the alliance formed by Lady Theodora with the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. It is for you to judge the value of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Was ich Euch anbiete, sind die Koordinaten Eurer zukünftigen Trophäe und ein Team von Arbitratoren, die Euch helfen, das Schiff zu übernehmen. Ihr würdet dadurch reich und setzt außerdem die zwischen Lady Theodora und dem Adeptus Arbites geschlossene Allianz fort. Über den Wert dieser Gelegenheit müsst Ihr selbst entscheiden."

languages.original_text: "What I am offering is the coordinates of your future trophy and a team of Arbitrators to help you take the vessel.
